desc:
Akira River/Jessica Moon\
Schweiz, 2022, 8 Min, Kein Dialog

In a powerfully slow-mo film, the two players dance around each other like two foxes on the prowl, exploring each other. The focus is on the touches of bodies encased in latex skin, on the mouths that explore, on the faces that mutually feel, on the saliva that is shared, and on the breath that is controlled and held.
title: Mirage
